text:
Hello!
Any Pluto support in Franklin?

elements.text:
Hello!
Any Pluto support in Franklin?

text: You honestly don't need the stuff that Pluto provides for Franklin. You can just open up your editor and make changes. Let Franklin's server take care of file changes.

elements.text: You honestly don't need the stuff that Pluto provides for Franklin. You can just open up your editor and make changes. Let Franklin's server take care of file changes.

text: Hmmmm? I was talking about automatically converting Pluto notebooks to html and then hosting them on the site(instead of individually converting each notebook via browser)

elements.text: Hmmmm? I was talking about automatically converting Pluto notebooks to html and then hosting them on the site(instead of individually converting each notebook via browser)

text: ^ <@UUTL3EKN3> reached out a short while back to suggest exactly this kind of stuff, we've not yet had the time to discuss how this support could look like or what the steps to reach it would be but it's something I'd be keen to help support :slightly_smiling_face:
